1.content:
The story starts In a grungy village of hobgoblins where the young hobgoblin witchling is in her hut brewing a potion in her cauldron, while standing on a stool...

She wore a green bandana, a shawl with a single button, and a tatty dirty dress. Apparently she also looked to cute to be like a hobgoblin, but only because she was young prodigious child.

the young Hobgoblin witch rubs her slightly-exposed belly as she stirs her brew...



What happens next?
1.title: Working on a potion...

choices: Your friend Citrine, the Goblin Mage from the Magic Academy...
Ariane, a Legendary Mage of Gielinor...
IronButt, The Hobgoblin smithy of the village...
11.content:
Suddenly, The little Witchling hears a knock on the door. Someone wants to seen you...


It was...
11.title: Someone wants to visit...

choices: She visits the local general store...
She visits "RipSnot" the local Hobgoblin Smithy...
She leaves the village to explore...
12.content:
She leaves her hut to go out for a breather...



Is there anything else she can do before going out on an adventure?
12.title: She looks outside for more ingredients...

13.content: The young hobgoblin checks the shelves to see what she can add...
13.title: She checks the shelves...

info.brief_description: A Prodigious hobgoblin child with powers goes on a series of funny misadventures...
info.description:
This story is about a young and cute hobgoblin witch who lives in a village of hobgoblins, She may be a cute and magical witch, but she's rude, obnoxious, agressive, ill-tempered and stubborn, also she smells very bad because she's a hobgoblin and is very flatulent...

Also she goes on a series of misadventures...




NOTE: This story contains anime loli
